item.title: By: Cormac Brick
item.dc:creator: Cormac Brick
item.description:
First off thanks for a great day.
Towards the end of the day it was mentioned that the slides from the various presenters would perhaps be made available on this site. Can you confirm if this will happen?
item.content:encoded:
First off thanks for a great day.

Towards the end of the day it was mentioned that the slides from the various presenters would perhaps be made available on this site. Can you confirm if this will happen?

item.title: By: walter
item.dc:creator: walter
item.description: It was a great event - well worth the trip up.
item.content:encoded: It was a great event – well worth the trip up.

item.title: By: Derek Organ
item.dc:creator: Derek Organ
item.description: Thanks for all the hard work organising it, hopefully we'll see more like it soon.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for all the hard work organising it, hopefully we’ll see more like it soon.
